article_title: All I Want For Christmas Is A Less Naughty Government

article_metadata.description: It's nearly Christmas and Santa's coming. Has Washington been naughty or nice? In 2013, Congress has passed and the president has signed into law 57 pieces of legislation by my quick count. They’re our elected representatives, doing what they were voted into office to do. If we’re unhappy, the relevance of even-numbered years [...]
article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.
